title: St. Augustine - 6 biographies
description:
ST. AUGUSTINE (354-430 C.E.), bishop of Hippo, was an early Christian theologian and philosopher whose writings were very influential in the development of western Christianity and western philosophy.

These six biographies are intended to complement my collection of St. Augustine's writings available here: <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10363758/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10363758/</a>  


The following books are in PDF format:

* Peter Brown - AUGUSTINE OF HIPPO: A BIOGRAPHY (University of California Press, 2000).  New edition with an Epilogue.

* John Capgrave - LIFE OF SAINT AUGUSTINE (Pontifical Institute of Medieval Studies, 2001).  Edited by Cyril Lawrence Smetana, O.S.A.

* Henry Chadwick - AUGUSTINE OF HIPPO: A LIFE (Oxford University Press, 2009).

* Gareth B. Matthews - AUGUSTINE (Blackwell, 2005).

* James O'Donnell - AUGUSTINE: A NEW BIOGRAPHY (HarperCollins, 2006).

* Garry Wills - SAINT AUGUSTINE: A PENGUIN LIFE (Penguin, 1999).
